content: but make a note of your position so you can continue knitting the chart correctly after completing the heel heel knit across needle 1 according to the chart you will now work short row to shape the heel on needle 2 all turns are made using the german short row technique r1 k all sts turn r2 p all sts turn r3 k until the previous turn turn r4 p until the previous turn turn repeat row 3-4 until you have 10 normal sts in the middle the first and last 10 sts will be double sts from the german short row turns #smällkaramellsocks by @princessknitss knit the remaining sts on n2 making sure you re knitting the double sts through both loops and then knitting across n1 according to the chart the next part will only be worked on n2 r1 k across the 10 double sts k11 sts turn r2 p11 sts turn r3 k to 1 st after the previous german short row turn then turn r4 p to 1 st after the previous german short row turn then turn repeat row 3-4 until all stitches have been worked k the remaining sts on n2 leg continue the chart on both n1 and n2 until the leg measures 13 cm from the heel if you want a longer sock just continue until desired length but keep in mind it will take more yarn than indicated in the pattern now knit 1x1 ribbing for 12 rounds and then finish with the italian bind off weave in any loose ends and block your socks according to your yarns instructions your socks are now done i d love to follow your progress and finished objects please use the #smällkaramellsocks and tag @princessknitss so i don t miss it #smällkaramellsocks by @princessknitss #smällkaramellsocks by @princessknitss
